executable.title: SUV Factor Calculator
executable.description: Computes the standardized uptake value conversion factors based on body weight, lean body mass, body surface area, and ideal body weight. Takes an input path to a directory containing a PET volume (DICOM header must contain Radiopharmaceutical parameters).
executable.contributor: Andrey Fedorov (SPL), Ethan Ulrich (University of Iowa), Markus van Tol (University of Iowa), Christian Bauer (University of Iowa), Reinhard Beichel (University of Iowa), John Buatti (University of Iowa), Hans Johnson (University of Iowa), Wendy Plesniak (SPL, BWH), Nicole Aucoin (SPL, BWH), Ron Kikinis (SPL, BWH)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is funded in part by Quantitative Imaging to Assess Response in Cancer Therapy Trials NIH grant U01-CA140206 and Quantitative Image Informatics for Cancer Research (QIICR) NIH grant U24 CA180918.
